overview: The sun shines bright down on Bibletown, where folks praise God at home and in the streets, up and down! His creations glow bright from the north to south, and the Good Word spills forth from every smiling mouth! Join wonderful friends, Mica and Mary, as they give thanks to God in song - and if you pay close attention, you too can sing along with Christian-themed songs and nursery rhymes!
title: Bible Friends
